Package com.example.freeturilo.connection

Class APIConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.freeturilo.connection.APIConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExternalConnection
    public class APIConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExternalConnection
    A Freeturilo API connection.

    Object of this class performs low-level operations on an HTTPS connection with Freeturilo API.

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miko≈Çaj Terzyk
    See Also:
    connection, ExternalConnection, APIConnection.Builder, HttpsURLConnection

      Builder of Freeturilo API connections.

      private javax.net.ssl.HttpsURLConnection connection

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void disconnect()
      Ends the connection.

      Gets the input stream of this connection which can be later used to retrieve the payload of this connection

      Gets the response code from the response of this connection.
